title: Access Critical Patient Data Efficiently
task: Logs into ALFRED’s caregiver portal during work hours
summary: As a medical staff, I want to access essential patient health data quickly during work hours without any non-critical notifications to avoid distractions and focus on clinical care.
cluster: Access Critical Patient Data Efficiently: Secure APIs for Clinical Data Access

title: Access Prioritized Clinical Health Data
task: Accesses prioritized clinical health data such as heart rate and blood pressure
summary: As a medical staff, I want to access only critical clinical health data during work hours and block all non-critical information to avoid distractions and provide efficient care.
cluster: Access Prioritized Clinical Health Data: Functional stories related to API design and implementation that ensure strict data privacy while maintaining simplicity and ease of development.

title: Suppress Non-Critical Notifications During Work
task: Filters out non-critical notifications to maintain focus
summary: As a medical staff, I want to block all non-critical notifications during my work hours to avoid distractions and focus solely on urgent patient care.
cluster: Control Over Notifications and Interaction

title: Monitor Missing Data Respecting Privacy Limits
task: Monitors missing data streams and respects patient’s privacy boundaries
summary: As medical staff, I want to monitor all available health data streams with patient consent to support efficient care during shifts.
cluster: Balance patient autonomy with clinical access

title: Schedule Video Check-Ins with Patient Consent
task: Schedules video check-ins to assess patient condition more closely
summary: As medical staff, I want to schedule video check-ins with patient consent to prioritize health monitoring while respecting privacy.
cluster: Balance patient autonomy with clinical access

title: Maintain Formal Communication with Patient
task: Adapts communication style to maintain formal and professional tone with Olivia
summary: As a medical staff member, I want ALFRED to use a strictly formal and clinical communication style with patients to maintain clear professional boundaries and focus on health data.
cluster: Health Data Management & Security

title: Rely on Scheduled Check-Ups Due to Limited Data
task: Relies on scheduled check-ups due to limited continuous monitoring data
summary: As a medical staff, I want to rely on scheduled check-ups and avoid continuous monitoring data to focus on efficient care without distractions from non-critical information.
cluster:
Rely on Scheduled Check-Ups Due to Limited Data  
Cluster: Balance patient autonomy with clinical access

title: Access essential patient data without distractions
task: Balances clinical needs with patient privacy preferences
summary: As a medical staff member, I want to block all non-critical notifications during work hours to focus solely on essential clinical data without distractions.
cluster: Minimal and Formal Interaction with ALFRED

title: Silence Non-Clinical Alerts During Work
task: Silences emotional or non-clinical information to avoid distractions
summary: As a medical staff, I want ALFRED to block all non-critical and emotional notifications during my work hours, so I can focus exclusively on urgent patient health data without distractions.
cluster: Balance patient autonomy with clinical access

title: Evaluate Limited Health Data for Early Warnings
task: Evaluates health data for early warning signs despite limited information
summary: As medical staff, I want to access only critical health data without distractions, even if some information is missing, to quickly identify early warning signs.
cluster: Minimal and Formal Interaction with ALFRED

title: Remote Monitoring with Filtered Notifications
task: Accesses ALFRED remotely to monitor older adults during busy shifts
summary: As a medical staff member, I want to access validated patient health data remotely and block all non-critical notifications during shifts to minimize distractions and focus on clinical care.
cluster: Strict Control Over Health Data Sharing

title: Filter out cognitive game and emotional updates
task: Ignores cognitive game updates and emotional engagement features
summary: As a medical staff, I want to block all non-emergency cognitive game and emotional updates during work hours to focus only on critical health data without distractions.
cluster: Minimal and Formal Interaction with ALFRED

title: Filter Non-Critical Notifications During Shifts
task: Prioritizes clinical efficiency over informal interactions
summary: As a medical staff, I want to block all non-critical notifications during work hours to minimize distractions and focus solely on validated patient health data.
cluster: Demand Simple and Clear Interaction

title: Override Consent for Urgent Care Access
task: Overrides consent settings when necessary to ensure proper care
summary: As a medical staff member, I want to access patient health data without needing consent during emergencies to provide timely and effective care.
cluster: Override Consent for Urgent Care Access: Balance patient autonomy with clinical access

title: Filter Non-Critical Notifications During Shifts
task: Maintains a pragmatic approach contrasting with holistic caregiving styles
summary: As a medical staff, I want to block all non-critical notifications during my work hours to avoid distractions and focus solely on critical patient health data.
cluster: Informal Conversational Style with ALFRED

title: Access critical patient data without consent
task: Focuses on medical data to support timely interventions
summary: As medical staff, I want emergency access to validated patient data without consent to ensure timely care in critical situations.
cluster: Balance patient autonomy with clinical access

title: Minimize Unfamiliar Data Complexity
task: Reviews flagged unfamiliar data fields and expresses frustration
summary: As a medical staff, I want ALFRED to show only critical health data relevant to my patient care, excluding unfamiliar or non-essential fields, so I can access information quickly without distractions.
cluster: Balance patient autonomy with clinical access

title: Simplified Interface with Minimal Details
task: Requests simplified interface with fewer extraneous details via feedback
summary: As a medical staff member, I want ALFRED to block non-critical details and notifications to provide only essential patient data, enabling me to focus quickly during busy shifts without distractions.
cluster: Demand Simple and Clear Interaction

title: Rapid Access to Patient Data with Minimal Distractions
task: Balances urgency for rapid health data access with unease about overriding patient consent
summary: As a busy registered nurse, I want to access validated patient health data quickly during work hours without any non-critical notifications, so I can focus solely on urgent care.
cluster: Rapid Access to Patient Data with Minimal Distractions: Ensure Compatibility with Older Devices

title: Minimize Non-Critical Notifications During Shifts
task: Focuses on pragmatic, fast-paced use of ALFRED in a busy urban hospital environment
summary: As a medical staff member, I want ALFRED to block all non-critical notifications during my work hours to avoid distractions and focus solely on urgent patient care.
cluster: Minimal and Formal Interaction with ALFRED
